mapper.select: SELECT id,clsx,dw from jczy_xfcl_sx where cllx=#{value} order by clsx

SELECT sx.id,sx.clsx,sx.dw, ( SELECT sxz.sxz from jczy_xfcl_sxz sxz where sxz.xfcl_sx_id = sx.id and sxz.xfcl_id=#{value} ) as sxz from jczy_xfcl_sx sx LEFT JOIN jczy_xfcl xfcl on xfcl.XFZBLXDM = sx.cllx where xfcl.XFCL_TYWYSBM = #{value} order by sx.clsx

SELECT sx.id,sx.clsx,sx.dw, ( SELECT sxz.sxz from jczy_xfcl_sxz sxz where sxz.xfcl_sx_id = sx.id and sxz.xfcl_id=#{value} ) as sxz from jczy_xfcl_sx sx LEFT JOIN jczy_xfzb xfcl on xfcl.XFZBLXDM = sx.cllx where xfcl.XFZB_TYWYSBM = #{value} order by sx.clsx

SELECT sx.clsx,sx.dw,sxz.sxz from jczy_xfcl_sx sx LEFT JOIN jczy_xfcl xfcl on xfcl.XFZBLXDM = sx.cllx LEFT JOIN jczy_xfcl_sxz sxz on sxz.xfcl_sx_id = sx.id and sxz.xfcl_id=xfcl.XFCL_TYWYSBM where xfcl.XFCL_TYWYSBM=#{value}
